Name: Anopheles Spatially Explicit (ANOSPEX)
Description: Mathematical model to simulate Anopheles mosquito dynamics, aiding in the development and evaluation of strategies to control malaria transmission, considering environmental factors and field data.
Data input: Mosquito population dynamics, Hourly weather data

Name: Arbovirus Mapping and Prediction System (ArboMAP)
Description: A software suite to model and predict mosquito-borne diseases, particularly arboviruses transmitted by mosquitoes, six weeks prior to peak transmission.
Data input: Mosquito infection, Daily weather, Long-range weather forecast, Human WNV cases

Name: Epigraph- Albopictus package
Method: Discrete-time stochastic susceptible / exposed / infected / recovered / chronic-stage (SEIRC) model
Description: An Albopictus-borne chikungunya outbreak risk prediction and stratification tool.
Model output: Vector abundance, Total number of infections, Outbreak risk

Name: Container-Inhabiting Mosquito Simulation Model (CIMSiM)
Description: A weather-driven dynamic life-table model of container-inhabiting mosquitoes such as Aedes aegypti.
Data input: Local meteorological data, Mosquito food availability, Availability of various breeding sites (containers) and Human demographic data
Country where applied: Australia, China, Columbia, Honduras, Malaysia, Puerto Rico, Thailand, United States

Name: Dengue simulation model (DENSiM)
Description: A Dengue simulation model based on CIMSiM
Data input: Ae. albopictus population output of CIMSiM, Temperature, Rainfall, Saturation deficit, and Human population data
Country where applied: Australia, China, Columbia, Honduras, Malaysia, Puerto Rico, Thailand, United States

Name: Dengue Disease Prediction and Diagnosis Model (DDPM)
Description: A dengue outbreak prediction model
Data input: Dengue data of Predict the Next Pandemic Initiative, Weather data

Name: Data-integrated Intelligent System for Health Adaptation (DISHA)
Data input: Global meteorological data, population data, environment and land data, national disease surveillance data, mobility data

Name: Malaria Prediction and Planning Toolkit
Data input: Global meteorological data, population data, environment and land data, malaria epi data, health program and operations data

Name: Disease Monitoring Dashboard
Description: The application to West Nile disease in the Mediterranean basin

Name: EPIDEMIA
Description: An EcoHealth Informatics System for integrated forecasting of malaria epidemics

Name: Epigraph
Description: A computational algorithm, to design a universal swine H3 influenza vaccine

Name: EPIPOI
Description: Analytical tool for temporal parameters from epidemiological time series

Name: EWARS
Description: Early Warning and Response System for dengue outbreaks

Name: HYDREMATS
Description: Hydrology, Entomology, and Malaria Transmission Simulator

Name: LIS-MAL
Description: Estimates of hydro-climatic suitability for malaria transmission in Africa

Name: LiverpoolMalariaModel
Description: Mathematical-biological model of malaria parasite dynamics using daily temperature and precipitation data

Name: Liverpool RVF model
Description: A dynamic, climate-driven model of Rift Valley fever

Name: MARA LITe
Description: Climate data and malaria distribution maps and estimated populations at risk

Name: MGDrivE 2
Description: A simulation framework for gene drive systems incorporating seasonality and epidemiological dynamics

Name: MVSE
Description: An R-package that estimates a climate-driven mosquito-borne viral suitability index

Name: OMaWa
Description: A dynamic model of some malaria-transmitting anopheline mosquitoes of the Afrotropical region

Name: OpenMalaria
Description:
A simulator program for studying malaria epidemiology and the impacts of interventions against malaria.
 a simulator program for studying malaria epidemiology and the impacts of interventions against malaria.
 a simulator program for studying malaria epidemiology and the impacts of interventions against malaria.
 a simulator program for studying malaria epidemiology and the impacts of interventions against malaria.
A simulator program for studying malaria epidemiology and the impacts of interventions against malaria.

Name: SCOPIC
Description: Seasonal Climate Outlooks in Pacific Island Countries

Name: SLIM
Description: Assess the impact of ivermectin treatment of cattle and buffalo with standard and long-lasting formulations on the survival of wild Anopheles on Sumba Island, Indonesia

Name: STEM
Description: An Open Source Tool for Disease Modeling

Name: VECTRI
Description: Community vector malaria model to simulate the spread of malaria

Name: Arboverse
Description: Data-driven platform and disease modelling to anticipate and mitigate arbovirus emergence

Name: CLIMSEDIS
Description: A climate-sensitive disease forecasting tool

Name: Chol-Out-EWS
Description: An open-source software application for community-level cholera outbreak risk prediction and feedback through early warning systems

Name: IDExtremes
Description: A modelling tool to predict the probability of infectious disease outbreaks given compound extreme climatic events
